section.title: StreamTraits< Stream > Struct Template Reference

listitem.para: Whether to make local copy of stream for optimization during parsing.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: By using traits pattern, this type provides a default configuration for stream. For custom stream, this type can be specialized for other configuration. See TEST(Reader, CustomStringStream) in readertest.cpp for example.

section.section:
Member Enumeration Documentation
anonymous enum template<typename Stream >
anonymous enum
Whether to make local copy of stream for optimization during parsing.
By default, for safety, streams do not use local copy optimization. Stream that can be copied fast should specialize this, like StreamTraits<StringStream>.
Enumerator
